metadata.title: USN-5041-1 -- libapreq2 vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that libapreq2 did not properly sanitize the Content-Type field in certain crafted HTTP requests. An attacker could possibly use the vulnerability to cause libapreq2 to crash.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5041-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libapreq2-doc - 2.13-3ubuntu2+esm1 libapache2-mod-apreq2 - 2.13-3ubuntu2+esm1 libapreq2-dev - 2.13-3ubuntu2+esm1 libapache2-request-perl - 2.13-3ubuntu2+esm1 libapreq2-3 - 2.13-3ubuntu2+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
